title: Backend build failures preventing E2E test execution
description: Multiple backend source files are corrupted or incomplete, causing TypeScript build failures and preventing the development server from starting. This blocks E2E test execution. Affected files include: backend/src/services/reporting.ts (incomplete fragment), backend/src/services/assets.ts (empty), backend/src/routes/requests.ts (duplicate declarations), backend/src/routes/notifications.ts, backend/src/routes/reporting.ts, backend/src/routes/workflow.ts, backend/src/routes/integrations.ts (not tracked in git). Build errors include missing exports, top-level await issues, and duplicate symbol declarations. Root cause appears to be corruption from previous automated refactoring commits.
